section.heading: Relief from joint and several liability on joint return

content.p:
General. The provisions of section six thousand fifteen of the internal
revenue code applicable to the liability of individuals who file joint
income tax returns shall apply to the same extent as if such section of
such code were contained in and made part of this section, except to the
extent that any provision of such section is either inconsistent with or
not relevant to this article and except as modified in subsection

of
this section, or with such other modifications as may be necessary to
adapt the language of such provisions to the provisions of this article.
Modifications. Section six thousand fifteen of the internal\nrevenue code shall be read as modified by this subsection.\n
"Secretary" shall be read as "commissioner".\n
"Internal revenue service" shall be read as "department of\ntaxation and finance".\n
"Tax court" shall be read as "division of tax appeals".\n
In the heading of subsection
and in clause (ii) of\nsubparagraph (A) of paragraph three of subsection
, the phrase\n"section 6013
" shall be read as "paragraphs two, three and four of\nsubsection
of section six hundred fifty-one of this article".\n
In paragraph three of subsection
, the phrase "section\n6662
(A)" shall be read as "subsection
of section six hundred\neighty-five of this article".\n
In subparagraph (B) of paragraph two of subsection

, the phrase
"section 1 or 55" shall be read as "section six hundred one of this
article".
In clause
of subparagraph (B) of paragraph one of subsection\n
, the phrase "section 6851 or 6861" shall be read as "section six\nhundred ninety-four of this article" and "section 7485" shall be read as\n"subsection
of section six hundred ninety of this article".\n
In paragraph two of subsection

, the phrase "section 6502"
shall be read as "section one hundred seventy-four-a of this chapter and

In subparagraph (A) of paragraph three of subsection

of section six\nhundred eighty-nine of this article".\n
The following provisions of such section six thousand fifteen\nshall be disregarded: (A) The phrase "notwithstanding the provisions of\nsection 7421
" contained in clause (ii) of subparagraph (B) of\nparagraph one of subsection
; and (B) subparagraph (C) of paragraph\nthree of subsection
Federal determination. If an individual is relieved of a federal\nincome tax liability pursuant to subsection

of section six thousand
fifteen of the internal revenue code, there shall be a rebuttable
presumption that such individual shall also be entitled to equivalent
relief from liability under this section, to the extent that such
individual has an understatement of tax under this article for the same
taxable year that is attributable to the same erroneous item or items to
which the individual's federal income tax liability was attributable.
